page.title: 17A Cottage and its contents 1
page.content: Gwen and Nick Teage live in a three-bedroomed brick and flintstone cottage in Stibbard. It is about 200 years old. It has electricity, but no gas. There is no mains gas supply to the village. It has mains water but no mains drainage, and relies on its own septic tank buried in the garden. This page and the next list the contents of some of its rooms. {Sitting Room -}Bed Settee, 2 Arm Chairs, Child's Rocking Chair,Coffee Table,Book Case,Chest of Drawers,Television,Stereo & Radio, Chest, 2 Stools, Corner Cupboard,Fitted bookshelves, Sold Fuel Room Heater/Central Heating Boiler, Electric Fire, Radiator, Fitted Carpet, 3 Rugs, Table Lamp, Cheese Plant, several pictures on the walls, photos and ornaments. {(Continued on 18)
